entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 09:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: -33.5°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -36.9°C
Wind: NNW 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:10 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 38.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 38. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:10 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 57 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 08:10 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
